subscriptionSmall.label: Enter your email address and you will be one of the first to know about the launch of the service.

features: Choose any bag from the <COMPANYNAME> collection.
Change at any time to any other from the <COMPANYNAME> collection.
description: We have collected the best items of famous brands, our collection is constantly being updated and growing.
The whole collection is available for the club members. Currently <COMPANYNAME> is a private club, which you can join only by invitation.
But in the future we want to make <COMPANYNAME> open.
<COMPANYNAME> members can pick up items from our collection as many times as they want to.
mainFeature: Rent original branded bags by subscription and exchange them with any other from our collection whenever you want just for <PRICE>.

fashionGrid.lastLabel: The complete collection of bags will be available to subscribers after the launch of the project

title.main: Leave your email, and be the first to find out about the launch and to book the items:

title: Thank you for registration
main: We are glad to have found your email and we will notify you as soon as the service is launched, you can also take part in a test launch of the project.
We have sent you an email with a confirmation email link, after which a 15% discount will be assigned to you.
If you havenâ€™t received the letter, check whether it is in SPAM.

emailConfirmed.main: Your email is confirmed, after the launch of the project you will receive a 15% discount. The final collection may not have any bags.
